channel.title: johnjohnston tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from johnjohnston.

item.description: Read: Small Things Like These by Claire Keegan üìö ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ A beautiful wee book that drew me in quietly & has stuck in my mind. Ireland 1985, A gentle slightly troubled man digs deep. ‚ÄúHunters in the Snow‚Äù on the cover seems fitting as the village approaches a snowy Christmas.

item.description: https://t.co/Gu8tLhIxtC Marvellous! Does what it says on the tin. I found a great on on Eigg that seemed to be from a hill track. Couldn‚Äôt get the share link to work though. Via @joejenett

item.description:
I just got a Badger 2040 on a bit of a whim.

A hackable, programmable badge with E Ink¬Æ display, powered by Raspberry Pi RP2040. I‚Äôve only followed the basic tutorials so far & don‚Äôt know python but I think this could be an interesting wee device. https://t.co/wEgFtaQehj https://t.co/7dnuH7Pn9v
item.source:markdown:
I just got a Badger 2040 on a bit of a whim.

item.description: Had a bit of #microbit fun today. v2 sound is engaging & nice wee onboarding sequence too @NLDigitalSchool @DigiLearnScot https://t.co/0dJ6LkCJb8

item.description: Examples and more of using H5P that might be useful for #GlowBlog users interested in creating interactive resources @GlowScot https://t.co/srqUG96Wsb a branching presentation using H5P by @cogdog
